subject: NoSuchMethodError running from Ant
msgSnippet: Anyone know what might cause this? I am on Ant 1.5.2, JUnit 3.8.1 and JDK 1.4.1.  It would appear as if there are some old JUnit classes being used during the
messageBody:
Anyone know what might cause this? I am on Ant 1.5.2, JUnit 3.8.1 and JDK
1.4.1. It would appear as if there are some old JUnit classes being used
during the ant exection, but I dont know where they are coming from.

junit.framework.TestCase.name()Ljava/lang/String;

st(XMLJUnitResultFormatte
r.java:186)

nner.java:231)
